name: ShibaElonVerse
description: "ShibElonVerse is a new token based on the Binance Smart Chain. The main aim is to utilise the power of both blockchain and the metaverse. Each holder of ShibElonVerse tokens will automatically receive $ADA from the reward pool. The reward pool contains several $ADA tokens reserved by the contract. The contract uses a portion of the tax applied to every transaction (6% on buy and 7% on sell) to do this. The native token for ShibElonVerse is $SHIBEV and this will be used as the currency in ShibElonVerse. Inside ShibElonVerse $SHIBEV token will be used to reward holders, buy land, play games, and use other utilities inside the ecosystem. "
